info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 4 at 12:07PM CDT by NWS Memphis TN
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi...
Coldwater River at Marks
For the Coldwater River...including Marks...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Coldwater River at Marks.
* WHEN...From late Saturday night until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 41.0 feet, Widespread flooding of residential areas and farmland is occurring in northern Quitman county. Numerous secondary roads are flooded.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 34.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday morning and continue rising to a crest of 41.0 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 39.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis.
The next statement will be issued as needed.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
